# Central Limit Theorem {#thm-central-limit}

The **Central Limit Theorem (CLT)** is one of the most fundamental results in probability theory, stating that the [distribution](def-probability-distribution.qmd) of the normalized sum of [independent](def-independence.qmd) [random variables](def-random-variable.qmd) converges to a [normal distribution](def-normal-distribution.qmd).
